SEARCH
Package renderer

Class RayTracerBase

java.lang.Object
renderer.RayTracerBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleRayTracer
public abstract class RayTracerBase extends Object
Abstract base class for ray tracers in a rendering engine. This class provides the basic structure and common functionality for ray tracing algorithms.

      public RayTracerBase(Scene scene)

  • Method Details

    • renderImage

      public void renderImage(ImageWriter imageWriter)
      Renders the image using the provided image writer. This method should be overridden by subclasses to provide specific rendering behavior.
      Parameters:
      imageWriter - the image writer used to render the image

    • traceRay

      public Color traceRay(Ray ray)
      Traces a ray and determines the color at the intersection point. This method should be overridden by subclasses to provide specific ray tracing behavior.
      Parameters:
      ray - the ray to be traced
      Returns:
      the color at the intersection point, or black if no intersection

    • getScene

      public Scene getScene()
      Returns the scene associated with this ray tracer.
      Returns:
      the scene associated with this ray tracer
